p: 4. We noted in your submission details that a portion of your manuscript may have been presented or published elsewhere. ["An earlier version of this manuscript was published as a part of a dissertation. "] Please clarify whether this [conference proceeding or publication] was peer-reviewed and formally published. If this work was previously peer-reviewed and published, in the cover letter please provide the reason that this work does not constitute dual publication and should be included in the current manuscript.
